name: Customizer Login UI
author: Suhag Ahmed

sections.description:
The Customizer Login UI plugin allows you to create a customized login page for your WordPress website. If you need to personalize your basic admin login page, this plugin is helpful.

⚡ Detailed features

  • Unlimited color option
  • Add a custom logo image on the login page
  • Add a custom background image on the login page
  • Add a background brightness on the login page
  • Very easy installation
  • Flexible and easy to use
  • Lightweight and fast
sections.installation:
Installation from within WordPress

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New.
  2. Search for Customizer Login UI.
  3. Install and activate the Customizer Login UI plugin.

Manual installation

  1. Upload the entire customizer-login-ui folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Visit Plugins.
  3. Activate the Customizer Login UI plugin.
sections.faq:
Is Customizer Login UI free?

Yes, It’s a free WordPress Plugin.

Can I customize this?

Yes, It’s easy to customize the login page.

short_description: Customizer Login UI is a one-step solution for WordPress users to use.
